function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Costs of anti-contagion policies are visible, while health benefits are unseen","Impact":"Hesitation to implement policies, leading to increased infections and deaths","Mitigation":"Increase awareness of the unseen health benefits and provide evidence of the effectiveness of policies","Technologies":"Data analysis and reporting tools to visualize the impact of policies","People":"Populations and decision-makers","Owner":"Public health authorities and policymakers"},{"Description":"Business restrictions increase unemployment and school closures affect educational outcomes","Impact":"Social and economic costs of policies are a concern","Mitigation":"Implement support mechanisms for affected businesses and educational institutions","Technologies":"Economic relief packages, online education platforms","People":"Business owners, employees, students, and educators","Owner":"Government, educational institutions"},{"Description":"Comparing growth rate of infections before and after policy implementation","Impact":"Limited understanding of the direct health benefits of policies","Mitigation":"Conduct data analysis to measure the effects of policies on infection growth rates","Technologies":"Data analysis and statistical modeling tools","People":"Researchers, public health officials","Owner":"Research institutions, public health organizations"}]}
